short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reads selected text using the OpenAI Text-to-Speech API.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that converts selected text to speech using OpenAI's Text-to-Speech API. Features include multiple voices, playback controls, and audio download options.
